description: Ditch the takeaway with this easy take on the classic Indian rice dish. Lamb mince, brown rice, yoghurt and spices combine to create a biryani youâ€™ll love.
name: Easy Lamb Biryani Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.33 cup dry roasted cashews, roughly chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil in a large, deep frying pan over medium heat. Add onion and cook for 3 minutes, stirring, or until softened. Add paste and cook for 1 minute, stirring, or until fragrant.

Add lamb mince and cook for 5 minutes, breaking up lumps with a spoon, or until browned. Add rice and cook for 2 minutes, stirring, or until rice is coated and warmed through. Stir in spinach and cook for 2 minutes or until slightly wilted.
Combine yoghurt and cucumber in a small bowl. Serve biryani topped with yoghurt mixture, herbs, pickle and cashews.
